{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Jetson_Nano_Family.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Jetson Nano Developer Kit |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://developer.nvidia.com/embedded/jetson-nano-developer-kit |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = NVIDIA_Jetson_Nano_Developer_Kit |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = nVIDIA |model = Jetson |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Nano Developer Kit |revision = rev A02 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = nVIDIA;TM660M-A2; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A57 |cpu1spd = 1.43 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25U3235F; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT53D512M32D2DS-046 WT:D; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8111HS; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:04:4B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;4.9.201;Ubuntu 18.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 (Female Micro-B), Mini PCIe, Micro SD (TF) slot |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J44 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0, EDP, MIPI CSI, I2C, I2S, SPI, UART, GPIO, heatsink, |addchip = USB 3.0 Super-Speed HUB Controller;Realtek;RTS5411S;;1;,,, 5V 2 Phase Buck Controller;uPI Semi;uP1666Q;;2;,,, Triple-Channel High-Side Measurement Shunt & Bus Voltage Monitor;TI;INA3221;;1;,,, PMIC;Maxim Integrated;MAX77620A;;1;,,, 30V, 75A N-Channel Power MOSFET;ON Semi;NTTFS4C05N;;4;,,, 4 Mbit Serial Flash;Winbond;W25X40;;1;,,, 2.7V-18V, 5A eFuse Power MUX;TI;TPS25944L;;1;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXB0108;3;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = set at first login |defaultpass = set at first login |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2019 |estprice = 99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B084DSDDLT |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |multirev = Yes |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[nVIDIA]]'' Jetson Nano (TM660M-A2) :4x [[ARM]] (Cortex-A57) @1.43GHz *GPU: 128x ''Maxwell'' :4Kp60 HEVC/H.265, H.264 *Storage: 4MB flash + Micro SD (TF) slot *RAM: 4GB (LPDDR4) *USB: 4x USB 3.0 Type-A, :1x Micro USB 2.0 (OTG) *Power Source: 5V/4A DC via power jack, header, or micro-USB
==Links of Interest== *[https://elinux.org/Jetson_Nano ''Jetson Nano Wiki'' on '''eLinux'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/03/19/nvidia-jetson-nano-developer-kit/ ''NVIDIA Introduces $99 Jetson Nano Developer Kit'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/trimmed-down-jetson-nano-modules-ships-on-99-linux-dev-kit/ ''Trimmed-down Jetson Nano module ships on $99 Linux dev kit'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.hackster.io/news/introducing-the-nvidia-jetson-nano-aaa9738ef3ff ''Introducing the NVIDIA Jetson Nano'' on '''Hackster.io''']
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:Jetson_Nano_Family.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Jeston Nano Module Top.jpeg|Module Top File:Jetson Nano Module Bottom.jpeg|Module Bottom File:Jetson Nano Module Carrier Board Top.jpeg|Carrier Board Top File:Jetson Nano Carrier Board Bottom.jpeg|Carrier Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
